description: A unique identifier for each unique combination of a Person, Payer, Plan, and Period of time.
comment: Primary Key for the PAYER_PLAN_PERIOD table.

description: The Person covered by the Plan.
comment: Foreign Key: PERSON.person_id. A Person may have multiple overlapping payer plan periods.

description: Represents the organization who reimburses the provider administering care to the Person.
The Payer as it appears in the source data.
Stores the OMOP concept_id if the source Payer is coded in a supported vocabulary.
Represents the specific health benefit Plan the Person is enrolled in.
The health benefit Plan as it appears in the source data.
Stores the OMOP concept_id if the source Plan is coded in a supported vocabulary.
Represents the sponsor who finances the Plan (e.g., self-insured, small or large group health plan).
The Plan sponsor as it appears in the source data.
Stores the OMOP concept_id if the source Sponsor is coded in a supported vocabulary.
Common identifier for all people covered by the same policy (often a family).
comment: Typically shared enrollment digits across policy members.

description: Represents the reason the Person left the Plan, if known.
comment: Foreign Key: CONCEPT.stop_reason_concept_id (Domain: Plan Stop Reason).

description: The Plan stop reason as it appears in the source data.
comment: Source value for plan stop reason.

description: Stores the OMOP concept_id if the source stop reason is coded in a supported vocabulary.
